name: CVD Equipment
overview: CVD Equipment Corporation designs, develops and manufactures customized equipment and process solutions used to develop and manufacture solar, nano and advanced electronic components, materials and coatings for research and industrial applications. The Company offers a range of chemical vapor deposition, gas control and other equipment, which is used by the customers to research, design and manufacture semiconductors, solar cells, smart glass, carbon nanotubes, nanowires, light emitting diodes (LEDs), micro electro-mechanical systems (MEMS) and industrial coatings, as well as equipment for surface mounting of components onto printed circuit boards. The Company operates in three divisions: CVD/First Nano, Stainless Design Concept (SDC) and Conceptronic/Research.
